dataList.dlg: Employee Gregor, reporting for duty! It’s an honor to join your mission, Manager!
Good morning, Manager! Morning roll call was all clear!
It’s lunch hours, Manager! I’ll perform the remaining tasks with due diligence!
Nothing to report, Manager Dante!
Manager! I’m still adjusting to life here… but thanks to everyone’s assistance, I am without trouble. Ms. Rodya often has unsavory comments, but… Haha, it’s alright.
I’ll fight my enemies without hesitation. I’d made up my mind the day I was honored with an opportunity to get the modification procedure.
Oh, this arm? I’m proud of it. It’s a tremendous boon to be able to enter the fray of battle… rather than helplessly watch from afar.
The augmentation… I don’t regret it. One downside, though… is that I won’t ever be able to return to civilian life.
Nowadays… I try not to think much about what I do. It’s getting too taxing to keep up with this otherwise.
Manager? I see you’ve taken a temporary leave. I’ll be on standby.
Salutations! I’ll continue to aid you to the best of my ability, Manager!
It’s an honor, Manager!
I will do my utmost!
Manager Corporal Gregor reporting!
Roger that!
I got a clean hit!
Ngh…
I took one down!
I’ll work harder to make up for it…
Splendid strategy, Manager!
You trusted me with it… and yet I failed.
It’s all thanks to you, Manager. Your tactical prowess shined.
This victory was all thanks to you, Executive Manager.
This… is what a war is. I was wholly unqualified.
